annotations: Dear colleagues Good day Direct Charteres are open with following firm cargo: Cargo total: 20,000mt 10pct molooCargo breakdown:10.000 AN in BB from Kaliningrad, KMPT, draft 8,0m FW, LOA 175m, Beam 26m  IMO 5.1 UN NO 2067 – APP B & A 60 NEEDED, Dimensions: diam 1,1 m, height 1,1 m, weight abt 1000 kgMax 8 tiers in the holdPlus5.000 NPK + 5.000 MOP in bulk from Ust-Luga, in separate holdsLoading rates: 2,000 shinc at Kaliningrad and 4.000 shinc at Ust LugaDischarge ports: Beira + NacalaDischarging rates: 1500 shinc at Beira and 1500 shinc NacalaLaycan: 05-10.09.2024, can try laycan 01-05/09 but Kaliningrad to be 2nd loading port (8m FW)CHABEGeared tonnage onlyBest offers invited2.5 add comm pus Charteres are collecting best offers.Please send Your firm offers together with vessels description, preliminary cargo plan, itinerary and freight/Demm ideas. Pls offer firm Thanks & Best regards Aleksey PetrukhinAs Brokers only         Email chartering@map-chartering.comTel + 37127162286 (Viber & WhatApp) Skype a.petrukhinWeChat: wxid_kqzchsewc6l622 P.S. Please send Your tonnage daily positions to - Chartering@map-chartering.com
